price: បន្ទាប់មក ចូរពួកអ្នកដោតគេនឹងច្រវាក់ដែលមានប្រវែង របស់វាចិតសិបហត្ថចុះ។
arabic: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: thumma fī sil'silatin dharʿuhā sabʿūna dhirāʿan fa-us'lukūhu
